con:interface.name: Smart Bytes-Rest APIs
con:interface.con:description: Rest APIs for students to practice on local machine. Download the API operations to Postman/Soap UI using URL : http://localhost:8080/v2/api-docs

con:part.con:content: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"description":"Rest APIs for students to practice on local machine. \n Download the API operations to Postman/Soap UI using URL : http://localhost:8080/v2/api-docs","version":"1.0","title":"Smart Bytes-Rest APIs","termsOfService":"Terms of service","contact":{"name":"Sashi R","url":"http://v-logics.com","email":"trainingatsmartbytes@gmail.com"},"license":{"url":"http://v-logics.com"}},"host":"localhost:8080","basePath":"/","tags":[{"name":"Customer API","description":"Operations related to Customers"},{"name":"Authorization API","description":"Operations for User Authorization"},{"name":"Employee API","description":"Operations related to Employee"},{"name":"Product API","description":"Operations related to Products"},{"name":"Country API","description":"Read countries information"}],"paths":{"/api/country/country/get/all":{"get":{"tags":["Country API"],"summary":"list","operationId":"listUsingGET","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"type":"object"}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/api/country/get/iso2code/{alpha2_code}":{"get":{"tags":["Country API"],"summary":"findByISO2Code","operationId":"findByISO2CodeUsingGET","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"alpha2_code","in":"path","description":"alpha2_code","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"type":"object"}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/api/country/get/iso3code/{alpha3_code}":{"get":{"tags":["Country API"],"summary":"findByISO3Code","operationId":"findByISO3CodeUsingGET","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"alpha3_code","in":"path","description":"alpha3_code","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"type":"object"}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/api/customer/add":{"post":{"tags":["Customer API"],"summary":"Add a customer","operationId":"savecustomerUsingPOST","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"customer","description":"customer","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Customer"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseEntity"}},"201":{"description":"Created"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/api/customer/delete/{id}":{"delete":{"tags":["Customer API"],"summary":"Delete a customer","operationId":"deleteUsingDELETE","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"id","required":true,"type":"integer","format":"int64"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseEntity"}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"204":{"description":"No Content"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"}}}},"/api/customer/list/json":{"get":{"tags":["Customer API"],"summary":"List customers as JSON","operationId":"list1UsingGET","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved list","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Iterable"}},"401":{"description":"You are not authorized to view the resource"},"403":{"description":"Accessing the resource you were trying to reach is forbidden"},"404":{"description":"The resource you were trying to reach is not found"}}}},"/api/customer/list/xml":{"get":{"tags":["Customer API"],"summary":"List Customers as XML","operationId":"list2UsingGET","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/xml"],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Iterable«Customer»"}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/api/customer/show":{"get":{"tags":["Customer API"],"summary":"Search a customer with an ID","operationId":"showcustomerUsingGET","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"id","in":"query","description":"id","required":true,"type":"integer","format":"int64"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved list","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Customer"}},"401":{"description":"You are not authorized to view the resource"},"403":{"description":"Accessing the resource you were trying to reach is forbidden"},"404":{"description":"The resource you were trying to reach is not found"}}}},"/api/customer/update/{id}":{"put":{"tags":["Customer API"],"summary":"Update a customer","operationId":"updatecustomerUsingPUT","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"id","required":true,"type":"integer","format":"int64"},{"in":"body","name":"customer","description":"customer","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Customer"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseEntity"}},"201":{"description":"Created"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/api/employee/add":{"post":{"tags":["Employee API"],"summary":"Add an employee","operationId":"saveemployeeUsingPOST","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"employee","description":"employee","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Employee"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseEntity"}},"201":{"description":"Created"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not forbidden"},"404":{"description":"The resource you were trying to reach is not found"}}}},"/api/employee/show/{id}":{"get":{"tags":["Employee API"],"summary":"Search a employee with an forbidden"},"404":{"description":"The resource you were trying to reach is not found"}}}},"/api/employee/update/{id}":{"put":{"tags":["Employee API"],"summary":"Update an employee","operationId":"updateemployeeUsingPUT","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"id","required":true,"type":"integer","format":"int64"},{"in":"body","name":"employee","description":"employee","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Employee"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseEntity"}},"201":{"description":"Created"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/api/product":{"post":{"tags":["Product API"],"summary":"Add a product","operationId":"saveProductUsingPOST","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/xml","application/json"],"parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"product","description":"product","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Product"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseEntity"}},"201":{"description":"Product added successfully","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseEntity"}},"401":{"description":"You are not authorized to view the resource"},"403":{"description":"Accessing the resource you were trying to reach is forbidden"},"404":{"description":"The resource you were trying to reach is not found"}}}},"/api/product/list/json":{"get":{"tags":["Product API"],"summary":"List Products as JSON","operationId":"list2UsingGET_1","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Iterable«Product»"}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/api/product/list/xml":{"get":{"tags":["Product API"],"summary":"List Products as XML","operationId":"list1UsingGET_1","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/xml"],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved list","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Iterable"}},"401":{"description":"You are not authorized to view the resource"},"403":{"description":"Accessing the resource you were trying to reach is forbidden"},"404":{"description":"The resource you were trying to reach is not found"}}}},"/api/product/{id}":{"get":{"tags":["Product API"],"summary":"Search a product with an ID","operationId":"showProductUsingGET","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"id","required":true,"type":"integer","format":"int64"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved list","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Product"}},"401":{"description":"You are not authorized to view the resource"},"403":{"description":"Accessing the resource you were trying to reach is forbidden"},"404":{"description":"The resource you were trying to reach is not found"}}},"put":{"tags":["Product API"],"summary":"Update a product","operationId":"updateProductUsingPUT","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"id","required":true,"type":"integer","format":"int64"},{"in":"body","name":"product","description":"product","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Product"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Product updated successfully","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseEntity"}},"201":{"description":"Created"},"401":{"description":"You are not authorized to view the resource"},"403":{"description":"Accessing the resource you were trying to reach is forbidden"},"404":{"description":"The resource you were trying to reach is not found"}}},"delete":{"tags":["Product API"],"summary":"Delete a product","operationId":"deleteUsingDELETE_2","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"id","required":true,"type":"integer","format":"int64"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"Product deleted successfully","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseEntity"}},"401":{"description":"You are not authorized to view the resource"},"204":{"description":"No Content"},"403":{"description":"Accessing the resource you were trying to reach is forbidden"},"404":{"description":"The resource you were trying to reach is not found"}}}},"/api/user/login":{"post":{"tags":["Authorization API"],"summary":"Authorize User","description":"You need to pass X-Username & X-Password as header parameters","operationId":"loginUsingPOST","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"type":"string"}},"201":{"description":"Created"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/api/user/logout":{"post":{"tags":["Authorization API"],"summary":"logout","operationId":"logoutUsingPOST","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["*/*"],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"type":"string"}},"201":{"description":"Created"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}}},"definitions":{"Iterable«Product»":{"type":"object"},"ResponseEntity":{"type":"object","properties":{"body":{"type":"object"},"statusCode":{"type":"string","enum":["100","101","102","103","200","201","202","203","204","205","206","207","208","226","300","301","302","303","304","305","307","308","400","401","402","403","404","405","406","407","408","409","410","411","412","413","414","415","416","417","418","419","420","421","422","423","424","426","428","429","431","451","500","501","502","503","504","505","506","507","508","509","510","511"]},"statusCodeValue":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}},"Employee":{"type":"object","properties":{"email":{"type":"string","description":"Email address"},"firstName":{"type":"string","description":"First Name"},"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"The database generated user id"},"lastName":{"type":"string","description":"Last Name"}}},"Iterable":{"type":"object"},"Iterable«Customer»":{"type":"object"},"Customer":{"type":"object","properties":{"city":{"type":"string","description":"City"},"county":{"type":"string","description":"Country"},"email":{"type":"string","description":"Email address"},"firstName":{"type":"string","description":"First Name"},"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"lastName":{"type":"string","description":"Last Name"},"phone1":{"type":"string","description":"Phone 2"},"phone2":{"type":"string","description":"Phone 2"},"state":{"type":"string","description":"State"},"web":{"type":"string","description":"Web Page"},"zip":{"type":"string","description":"Zip code"}}},"Iterable«Employee»":{"type":"object"},"Product":{"type":"object","required":["price"],"properties":{"description":{"type":"string","description":"The product description"},"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"The database generated product ID"},"price":{"type":"number","description":"The price of the product"},"productId":{"type":"string","description":"The application-specific product ID"}}}}}

con:method.name: showcustomerUsingGET
con:method.con:description: Search a customer with an ID

con:method.name: showemployeeUsingGET
con:method.con:description: Search a employee with an ID

con:method.name: showProductUsingGET

con:method.name: loginUsingPOST
con:method.con:description: You need to pass X-Username & X-Password as header parameters Authorize User

con:assertion.name: Validate Response is a Valid HTTP Status Code(200) <--VALID HTTP STATUS CODE-->
Validate Response is obtained within 200ms <--RESPONSE SLA-->
Retrieve all the station Names <--XQUERY MATCH-->
